original_text: Do not be jealous of other people. Do not become angry or shout at them. Do not quarrel with other people or insult them. Do not do anything or say anything that will hurt other people.
korean_text: 너희는 모든 악독과 노함과 분냄과 떠드는 것과 비방하는 것을 모든 악의와 함께 버리고

sentences.original_text: Do not be jealous of other people
Do not become angry or shout at them
Do not quarrel with other people
or say anything that will hurt other people
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람을 상하게 할 말을 하지 말라
